root:
Dragonslayer Dragonslayers follow the tradition set by their knight-captain of Anor Londo. They possess cross-spears, which can pierce dragonscale when wielded with strength. They also wear armor crafted in the Lion's image. Both are imbued with lightning. It is said the Lion himself had a special soul given by the King of Light, and an enchanted ring with the symbol of a lion. Such ancient relics would be a major boon to any Dragonslayer.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Lion, the Dragonslayer, the First-Born's Chosen, teaches a flexible set of skills for hunting and slaying dragons. Their lightning, manifestations of raw faith and arms, can pierce dragonscale. Though formidable hunters, they are also warriors experienced in coordinating with other knights, creating protective formations and casting miracles.
He swore an oath to his forgotten king and rock-willed comrade. Indefatigable sense of duty and purpose will kindle his companions.
The Lion requires a worthy foe! She was an illusion when I left, but my comrades are real.
Swift Strike Lightning Spear Princess' Guard Lightning Impale Lightning Dash Bountiful Sunlight Golden Glint Move Swift Strike Lightning Spear Princess' Guard Lightning Impale Lightning Dash Bountiful Sunlight Golden Glint
Initiate's Spear Hunter's Spear Squire's Spear Swordspear "Dragonslayer Spear" Dragonslayer Armaments Initiate's Armor Hunter's Armor Squire's Armor Knight's Armor "Dragonslayer Armor" Dragonslayer Armor
Restoration
Others:
I claim another trophy!
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Dynamic Duo Sacred Oath Captain's Vigil Lion's Assault
Covetous Serpent Ring Ring of the First Born Dragonslayer's Band Ring of the Sun Princess Leo Ring Dragonslayer's Soul Firstborn's Chosen Dragonslayer Swordspear Shield of the Rock "My King, what must I do when the Sun sets?"
All other attacks build electricity, greatly enhancing Lightning Impale's damage. Lightning Spear Lightning Impale
Two golden knights arrive at the Hamlet. One, a legendary Dragonslayer, looks to his much larger companion and nods. The bigger one returns the gesture, then departs. Perhaps he will some day rejoin the Dragonslayer?
It's no miracle, but... Let me tell you a story of my forgotten king... Stop wiggling or I'll get the spear!
You will replace the fat one! I've guarded the princess from worse than this! Have faith in our Father of Light!
Here, grip your weapon like this... You are travelling with a Knight-Captain, show some courage! Listen to me, and we'll survive!
You'll have to do... I'll back you up. Get in there! Defend the Queen, you fatty!
My King... I will find you, yet. I pierced rocky scales with this spear... we were together, then. Grant me strength through promise, friends, that we will fight together!
We chased out the Chosen Undead. Vermin shouldn't be a problem. I'll take first watch. Erect a perimeter and keep the light low.
Each enemy has a weakness. Even dragons. One strike. One dead dragon. You'll see why I can fell a dragon with one strike.
...
My companion-- HE'S DEAD! I can guard the princess without your pitiful help. A lion does not concern himself with the sheep.
Another trophy. The bell of Anor Londo tolls! Light guides my strike! Begone, faithless creature! Run back to your bonfire. Flee to your soapstone vermin. I want a challenge. I've slain dragons. Why would you be different?
The Princess! Where is she?
Another adventurer? Why so many!?
Finally... A fight!
Stop holding back!
The Executioner is USELESS!
I wish I had estus...
Who turned off the light!? DAMN THAT PALE, YOUNG GIRL!
They will never reach the Princess!
I never surrender!
O Nameless King, I search for you!
You are nothing compared to a knight!
The Age of Light will live on!
Another boulder to cut!
Light, aid me!
Anor Londo lives! Virtue untold! Remain tall!
My strength is yours!
Gaze upon the sun's majesty! Now you feel the light's warmth! Ready to strike! Prepared for the hunt! The Executioner died. Am I next? ... was leaving the right choice? I refuse to be a coward... How much Estus do they have!? Why do they roll so much!? How many will they have next time!? My pain. Beautiful. Scar me that I may have more stories to tell! You're no dragon, but you'll do. Why are you here if you cannot fight? Should have travelled with a better group... This group is not ideal... I wonder what would happen if I wasn't here. Light leads me alone to victory! My souls! MINE! Am I worthy of this spear? ... My lady, I've failed you. I remember when the sun shone in Anor Londo. Is it all a lie? It... isn't real? All of it? The sun? Dark? I need a moment to focus. Let me fall back, I've pressing concerns. I need some time. You first-- I'll strike after! No! You will not hit me again! Moving back, they are going to attack me. Another scar, another trophy. Break yourself upon my body! No words. Only battle. I will restore the sun! FIND THE PRINCESS! I'll find that snake-laden girl... The light is this way! Maybe I need another spear... OUR BLACKSMITH MADE ESTUS!? What use is a knight without his princess? My life will kindle the fire... Can I even kindle the smallest flame? We sent them to the Asylum. In the Asylum, they suffered. ... I don't know if this is right. The glory is mine! The trophy is mine! They don't have enough Estus, so I won't use it! No trophy, no Dragonslayer. Hm. Perhaps something new at the blacksmith... I need some Estus. I am not supposed to be here. Why!? I don't know what to do! They have infinite Estus! Why can't I hit them when they roll!? I do not recall seeing you in the Cathedral! I disagree. Nope. F***ing Casual Why? This makes no difference. End this, or end me. Find the sun first! So dark! So dark without the Princess! Faith. Faith! Faith betrayed!?! I see an Estus bottle! You withstand their attacks, and I'll follow-up! Use anything! EVERYTHING! It's my pain to endure! This is a great battle! No estus should make things interesting! Useless being! So fragile! Learn to roll. I know what needs to be done! Trust my experience. Filthy human! Why not just do this... We are unprepared for this place... Our time has come... Cursed world. Unending darkness! Who could replace the sun!? No sun and snake girls!? No wonder my King left! Fear is crippling me. This is unbearable! I can't perish here. DID YOU SEE THEM ROLL!? White phantoms. Red phantoms. Gold phantoms. Blue phantoms. I can hear them near us. Survive. Dodge, and roll! This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! I should have travelled with knights. Look, just support me, and I'll carry your weakness. Back in my day, you slayed a dragon to prove worth. You're all soft. Be glad that I'm here to save you. You are all so lucky to have me. You'd never last this long without me. We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. We ought to return to the Hamlet. White phantoms. Red phantoms. Blue Phantoms. Gold phantoms. I need to cool off a little bit! Pour on me some humanity! I left both of them! Come at ME! Here, if you dare! Let this dragonslayer's tale come to an end. I'm ready for death. I AM A RED PHANTOM! The fat man died because of ME! Can you fast roll? Just stay safe and collect souls. Just DODGE! ****ing casual. Do you know the Blades of the Darkmoon? RED PHANTOM! Let's not discuss that parry. Who needs to dodge roll? This has to end. You don't need me. If I die, then they leave our world, right!? Woops! Forgot I was the host. We cannot leave now. They'll ambush, we can't. This will be my end of my tale. Write my miracle after I die. This is a great battle, why would you want to leave it? I will have this trophy! We need to end this battle. I am no coward! Let's just finish them quickly. I feel fear. This is new! So cold and still-- like the dark! It's a gank! PHANTOMS!? That was predictable. I am not surprised. This is a great battle! You are a worthy opponent! Kill it before phantoms arrive! GANK SPANK! This is too much. I am no coward, why is this happening to me? It rolled. Did you guys hear that? It's an ambush! That wasn't smart. No stammina! Today is probably my worst day. Such a terrible day. I should have been faster. Move! Pathetic. Hardly noticed. Failure has invaded its world! Of course. There's no sun, so it's dark! This is so sad. I always expect the worst. We're going to die if you keep missing! MY LORD, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! STR, not DEX. ****ing casual. Go back to the bonfire, knave. Next time, I'll journey alone. Amazing job, hollow! Where's the Executioner? Of course. There's no sun. It was all an illusion. We need to leave. Great! Let's go... Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. Pft. Get strength and try again. Please, just get a different weapon. Huh! Nothing happened. Did you try a ligthning weapon, or fire weapon? They'll kill you! Now is our demise! I can see them coming for us. Very predictable! Of course. There's no sun, so it's dark. Failure has invaded your world. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? I can hear them. Come on, I'm itching for a fight. I hope we find a fight soon. Stop whining and let's move on. Did you piss there? I'm not moving there. No sun there! NO SUN THERE! No. No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. I want to fight. Duel means no estus. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... Humanity, only! Wait-- humanities are dark! Are you a phantom!? No healing in duels. Is that a hex!? Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Pointless. That will not help us win. Onward to our doom. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. That will not help us. This won't make any difference. Let me just decide for myself. The sun's gone-- what does it matter? I only accept stories of our Lord of Light. Hey, that's no miracle!.
That was so weak! I must say i am quite disappointed. Get good. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... O Nameless King, I wish I had found you... We shouldn't rest here... This place is cursed... I am very tired from being cursed... I can feel something near us... I know they are up to something. They will end us in our sleep. We need to fight something soon... So boring, can we continue our journey. I hope we fight shortly. You all seem very new to all this. Your best is not good enough. Should have found better companions. I wish I could rest a bit. I am very tireless right now. Give me a moment to recover some of my strength. This journey will end us. The results will be the same no matter what. I feel our end coming. All of this is too much for me. This journey is so confusing. Let's all get some sleep. This is a bad idea. I feel so tired and scared for no reason. This is a very confusing situation. I don't like this plan one bit. We need to fight more enemies. Where is a fight when you need one. You are not good enough. You are not worthy. No need for that, but alright, i will play along. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed for sure. I will lead us to victory. Loyalty is its own reward. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. I want to fight and not eat. This food is really bad. This is overcooked! It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's just eat later. Wow, this is pretty bad.
-----------------------------------------------------------

Dragonslayer Dragonslayers follow the tradition set by their knight-captain of Anor Londo. They possess cross-spears, which can pierce dragonscale when wielded with strength. They also wear armor crafted in the Lion's image. Both are imbued with lightning. It is said the Lion himself had a special soul given by the King of Light, and an enchanted ring with the symbol of a lion. Such ancient relics would be a major boon to any Dragonslayer.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Lion, the Dragonslayer, the First-Born's Chosen, teaches a flexible set of skills for hunting and slaying dragons. Their lightning, manifestations of raw faith and arms, can pierce dragonscale. Though formidable hunters, they are also warriors experienced in coordinating with other knights, creating protective formations and casting miracles.
He swore an oath to his forgotten king and rock-willed comrade. Indefatigable sense of duty and purpose will kindle his companions.
The lion requires a worthy foe! She was an illusion when I left, but my comrades are real.

Dragonslayer Dragonslayers follow the tradition set by their knight-captain of Anor Londo. They possess cross-spears, which can pierce dragonscale when wielded with strength. They also wear armor crafted in the Lion's image. Both are imbued with lightning. It is said the Lion himself had a special soul given by the King of Light, and an enchanted ring with the symbol of a lion. Such ancient relics would be a major boon to any Dragonslayer.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Lion, the Dragonslayer, the First-Born's Chosen, teaches a flexible set of skills for hunting and slaying dragons. Their lightning, manifestations of raw faith and arms, can pierce dragonscale. Though formidable hunters, they are also warriors experienced in coordinating with other knights, creating protective formations and casting miracles.
He swore an oath to his forgotten king and rock-willed comrade. Indefatigable sense of duty and purpose will kindle his companions.
The lion requires a worthy foe! She was an illusion when I left, but my comrades are real.

This has been fun so far! This is enjoyable! I love to fight! I should have travelled with knights. Look, just support me, and I'll carry your weakness. Such a terrible day. I should have been faster. Move! Pathetic. Hardly noticed. Failure has invaded its world! Of course. There's no sun, so it's dark! This is so sad. I always expect the worst. We're going to die if you keep missing! MY LORD, SAVE US FROM THIS FOOL! STR, not DEX. ****ing casual. Go back to the bonfire, knave. Next time, I'll journey alone. Amazing job, hollow! Where's the Executioner? Of course. There's no sun. It was all an illusion. We need to leave. Great! Let's go... Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. Pft. I can see them coming for us. Very predictable! Of course. There's no sun, so it's dark. Failure has invaded your world. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? I can hear them. Dragonslayer Dragonslayers follow the tradition set by their knight-captain of Anor Londo. They possess cross-spears, which can pierce dragonscale when wielded with strength. They also wear armor crafted in the Lion's image. Both are imbued with lightning. It is said the Lion himself had a special soul given by the King of Light, and an enchanted ring with the symbol of a lion. Such ancient relics would be a major boon to any Dragonslayer.
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The tradition of the Lion, the Dragonslayer, the First-Born's Chosen, teaches a flexible set of skills for hunting and slaying dragons. Their lightning, manifestations of raw faith and arms, can pierce dragonscale. Though formidable hunters, they are also warriors experienced in coordinating with other knights, creating protective formations and casting miracles.
He swore an oath to his forgotten king and rock-willed comrade. Indefatigable sense of duty and purpose will kindle his companions.
The Lion requires a worthy foe! She was an illusion when I left, but my comrades are real.
Swift Strike Lightning Spear Princess' Guard Lightning Impale Lightning Dash Bountiful Sunlight Golden Glint Move Swift Strike Lightning Spear Princess' Guard Lightning Impale Lightning Dash Bountiful Sunlight Golden Glint
Initiate's Spear Hunter's Spear Squire's Spear Swordspear "Dragonslayer Spear" Dragonslayer Armaments Initiate's Armor Hunter's Armor Squire's Armor Knight's Armor "Dragonslayer Armor" Dragonslayer Armor
